title: Woman Wearing Turban

nouns: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
A traditional Muslim headdress consisting of a long scarf wrapped around the head
Man's headdress made by winding a length of cloth round the head.
Man‚Äôs headdress made by winding a length of cloth round the head.

description: The female version of the üë≥ Man Wearing Turban emoji.
apple_vendor_description: The woman wearing a turban emoji on Apple devices showcases a sophisticated and culturally rich representation, with the turban rendered in vibrant colors and detailed folds. Apple's signature 3D shading and realistic lighting bring a tactile quality to the fabric, suggesting texture and depth. This emoji, with its dignified expression and thoughtful gaze, symbolizes individuality, cultural pride, and personal style, adding a unique flair to messages sent on Apple devices.
